Trade/Device Name(s): STA-R Evolution/Expert Series Automated Multi-Parametric Analyzer
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for STA-R Evolution/Expert Series Automated Multi-Parametric Analyzer, an in vitro clinical instrument for coagulation studies using plasma samples.
Indications for Use Summary: Fully automatic clinical instrument indicated for performance of tests on human plasma to aid in diagnosis of coagulation abnormalities and monitoring anticoagulant therapy.
